item.title: McCaulâ€™s Crypto Commission: First, Do No Harm
item.description: Authors: White, Nathan Published: February 2016 URL: https://www.accessnow.org/mccauls-crypto-commission-first-no-harm/ Tags: 2010s Digital Security Government Policy Abstract: However well-intended, a new Congressional commission on encryption may do more harm than good.
